title: Hamilton Beach Breakfast Sandwich Maker at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Easily make delicious and hot breakfast sandwiches using your favorite breads, meats, and other ingredients in under 5 minutes with the Breakfast Sandwich Maker. Innovative design cooks every layer of your breakfast sandwich to perfection. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/hamilton-beach-reg-breakfast-sandwich-maker/1041430170?Keyword=hamilton+beach+breakfast+sandwich+maker
Easily make delicious and hot breakfast sandwiches using your favorite breads, meats, and other ingredients in under 5 minutes with the Breakfast Sandwich Maker. Innovative design cooks every layer of your breakfast sandwich to perfection. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Say good morning to the new Hamilton beach breakfast sandwich maker. It's the perfect way to start your day off right. Choose your favorite bread like an english muffin, a pancake, a bagel or any other kind you prefer and place it on the bottom plate then layer on the ingredients you love, cheese, pre-cooked meat, veggies. Close the top plate add an egg scramble it whole and let it sizzle. Then top it all off with your bread and close the lid. Breakfast is ready in just five minutes. Simply slide the egg plate out and open up the breakfast sandwich maker. Delicious! Hot! Hearty! Now you can make breakfast quick and easy and it's dishwasher safe. So cleanup is fast and simple. The Hamilton beach breakfast sandwich maker. Finally, real breakfast real fast. Hamilton beach. Good thinking.
